Player History
Earned first career win on 4/2/1965...
Won Player of the Week award on 4/7/1965, winning 2 games with a 0.52 ERA...
Had first career hit on 9/4/1965, off Herm Starrette (BOS)...
Won Rookie of the Year Award in 1965, going 18-10, 2.81 ERA...
Won Pitcher of the Month award on 6/1/1966, going 7-2, 1.64...
Was selected to the 1966 Allstar game...
Set a new season AL-Record for Strikeouts with 246 on 9/26/1966 ...
Won Cy Young Award in 1966, going 27-13, 2.29 ERA...
Was selected to the 1967 Allstar game...
Was selected to the 1969 Allstar game...
Traded from New York (A) to Texas on 2/13/1970 (Going to NYY: LF C. May, P E. Sosa. Going to TEX: P M. Lolich)...
Was selected to the 1970 Allstar game...
Injured on 8/20/1970 with a Torn Ligament Elbow, out for full season...
Won Pitcher of the Month award on 7/1/1971, going 6-0, 1.38...
Was selected to the 1971 Allstar game...
Won World Series with Texas in 1972...
Won Player of the Week award on 6/17/1973, winning 2 games with a 0.00 ERA...
Was selected to the 1975 Allstar game...
Won Player of the Week award on 6/9/1976, winning 2 games with a 1.00 ERA...
